page.title: 03My Parents' Work
page.content:
My Dad works at{Betteshanger Pit.}He has two shifts 11.30am to 8.30pm and 5.30am till 2.00pm. My Dad's company is putting the iron girders in. There are about{800 people}working with him. My Dad broke his finger yesterday. He has been working for about three years at the pit. My Dad doesn't like the pit because{wages}are only{Â£97} instead of{Â£120.}My Dad would rather be an{accountant.}
My Mum works as a{Home Help.}She does about ten people. She works from 8.30am till 2.30pm and 5.30pm till 7.30pm. She does people's hair on Thursdays and Saturdays. My Mum gets {Â£50}a week altogether.
